November 12, 1952
Dr. Burton Paulu
kuom
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota
Dear Burton?
Prom one who appreciates the work involved in
conventions, please accept my sincere thanks for your
hospitality last week. Xou deserve much credit, sir.
Congratulations to you, sir, for your ascendency.
tou are a pillar of NAEB and all that it stands for.
Incidentally, I heard from the ladies that your
wife performed noble service, too. Ifm sure all the ladies appreÂ¬
ciated the work of your wife, and I*m sorry that Eleanor
waBn*t along.
Sincerely,
FESifah
Frank E. Schooley
Treasurer
